actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# 1. Load data
train_path = 'data/train.csv'
test_path = 'data/test.csv'
train_df = pd.read_csv(train_path)
test_df = pd.read_csv(test_path)
test_passenger_ids = test_df['PassengerId']

# 2. Combine for feature engineering
train_df['is_train'] = 1
test_df['is_train'] = 0
full_df = pd.concat([train_df, test_df], sort=False)

# 3. Feature Engineering
# 3.1 Title extraction
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Name'].str.extract(r',\s*([^\.]*)\s*\.', expand=False)
# Group rare titles
title_map = {
    'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs',
    'Lady': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare', 'Capt': 'Rare', 'Col': 'Rare',
    'Don': 'Rare', 'Dr': 'Rare', 'Major': 'Rare', 'Rev': 'Rare',
    'Sir': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare', 'Dona': 'Rare'
}
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Title'].replace(title_map)
rare_titles = full_df['Title'].value_counts()[full_df['Title'].value_counts() < 10].index
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Title'].replace(rare_titles, 'Rare')

# 3.2 Sex to numeric
full_df['Sex'] = full_df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1}).astype(int)

# 3.3 Family Size
full_df['FamilySize'] = full_df['SibSp'] + full_df['Parch'] + 1
full_df['IsAlone'] = (full_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3.4 Ticket group size
ticket_counts = full_df['Ticket'].value_counts()
full_df['TicketGroupSize'] = full_df['Ticket'].map(ticket_counts)

# 3.5 Cabin first letter
full_df['Cabin'] = full_df['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown')
full_df['CabinLetter'] = full_df['Cabin'].str[0]

# 3.6 Fare per person
full_df['FarePerPerson'] = full_df['Fare'] / full_df['FamilySize']
# handle inf/nan
full_df['FarePerPerson'].replace([np.inf, -np.inf], np.nan, inplace=True)

# 4. Handle Missing Values
# Embarked
full_df['Embarked'] = full_df['Embarked'].fillna(full_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])
#
